comments:
I was switching on multiple editor tabs in the Editors preference page.  I clicked the checkbox using the 
mouse and then hit enter to close the dialog.  For some reason I was greeted with the following:

ava.lang.NullPointerException

This was caused by the heap status being disposed twice (or added twice the
other way). Fixed in build >20051007
